issue.title: error: no matching function for call to 'upnpDiscover'
issue.body:
net.cpp:1066:15: error: no matching function for call to 'upnpDiscover'
    devlist = upnpDiscover(2000, multicastif, minissdpdpath, 0, 0, &error);
              ^~~~~~~~~~~~
/usr/local/include/miniupnpc/miniupnpc.h:62:1: note: candidate function not
      viable: requires 7 arguments, but 6 were provided
upnpDiscover(int delay, const char \* multicastif,

This error appears when i try to compile the source code

events.body: Please provide exact steps to reproduce. Including the software you are running on.

Yes, looks like an UPNP version conflict.
They like to just slap on arguments sometimes.
If you don't feel like debugging this I'd suggest configuring with `--without-miniupnpc`.

@paveljanik  @MarcoFalke 
I'm using mac OS X and I'm trying to compile the source code and every time I "make"... this error pops up.I don't really know which version i'm using.
@laanwj  would this effect any of my work flow in the future ?

@laanwj I'm using version 0.9.5 of bitcoin core.

should i try another version of bitcoin core ?
Closing, build issues with old versions are not supported...
@mohamedfawzy96 I am interested in your rationale in choosing 0.9.5. Did someone recommend it to you?

issue.title: Installation issue with make
issue.body:
When I do make I get the following error.  Any idea what the issue is?

make
Making all in src
/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/usr/bin/make  all-recursive
Making all in .
  CXX      net.o
net.cpp:1066:15: error: no matching function for call to 'upnpDiscover'
    devlist = upnpDiscover(2000, multicastif, minissdpdpath, 0, 0, &error);
              ^~~~~~~~~~~~
/usr/local/include/miniupnpc/miniupnpc.h:62:1: note: candidate function not
      viable: requires 7 arguments, but 6 were provided
upnpDiscover(int delay, const char * multicastif,
^
1 error generated.
make[3]: *** [net.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[1]: *** [all] Error 2
make: *** [all-recursive] Error 1

issue.title: net.cpp:1025:15: error: no matching function for call to 'upnpDiscover'
issue.body:
Hi there. While trying to compile for MacOS Sierra 10.12.3, just after the command:  make -f makefile.osx, I get:

/bin/sh ../share/genbuild.sh obj/build.h
llvm-g++ -c -g -msse2 -Wall -Wextra -Wformat -Wno-ignored-qualifiers -Wformat-security -Wno-unused-parameter  -DMAC_OSX -DMSG_NOSIGNAL=0 -DBOOST_SPIRIT_THREADSAFE -DUSE_UPNP=1 -DUSE_IPV6=1 -I/Users/SatMan1980/xenixcoin/src/leveldb/include -I/Users/SatMan1980/xenixcoin/src/leveldb/helpers -DHAVE_BUILD_INFO -I"/Users/SatMan1980/xenixcoin/src" -I"/Users/SatMan1980/xenixcoin/src"/obj -I"/opt/local/include" -I"/opt/local/include/db48" -MMD -MF obj/net.d -o obj/net.o net.cpp
**net.cpp:1025:15: error: no matching function for call to 'upnpDiscover'**
    devlist = upnpDiscover(2000, multicastif, minissdpdpath, 0, 0, &error);
              ^~~~~~~~~~~~
/opt/local/include/miniupnpc/miniupnpc.h:62:1: note: candidate function not
      viable: requires 7 arguments, but 6 were provided
upnpDiscover(int delay, const char * multicastif,
^
-----
Could you please let me know if you are using an old version of bitcoin core? I'm asking you this because that's the info I have found by doing some research. If that's the case I guess you should Pull the latest version of bitcoin core. As you can see in the following link:
"0.9.5 is old. You should use 0.13.0."

(original link) =>> https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/8967

PS: If you have another method to compile under MacOS, let me know

events.body: I suspect that the reason @mohamedfawzy96 chose v0.9.5 is that it is the latest stable version that is not labeled as a release candidate in the output from `git tag ` That is still the case today...
That's because it sorts alphabetically not numerically.

issue.title: Sources are too old and need to be updated
issue.body:
It is a hell to run it in general because of different libraries I need to link on OS X manually. Additionally the sources are so old that it causes random bugs like this one (the solution is there too):
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/8967
So could anybody update the sources?

issue.title: [WIP] enable UPnP
issue.body:
import UPnP implementation from novacoin.

# status
- [x] macOS(both dynamic and static link)
- [x] linux(dynamic link only)
- [ ] windows(static link only)

# changes
- import upnp implementation from novacoin (ref: https://github.com/novacoin-project/novacoin/commit/1c7ed42093c5935e3958584ed98a2b03466a0023)
- fix build error that is when uses miniupnpc 1.9.20150730 over.(ref: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/8967#issuecomment-254843146 )

issue.title: compilation error against miniupnp on CentOS7
issue.body:
```
/root/draftcoin/src/leveldb/include -I/root/draftcoin/src/leveldb/helpers -DHAVE_BUILD_INFO -fno-stack-protector -fstack-protector-all -Wstack-protector -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2  -MMD -MF obj/net.d -o obj/net.o net.cpp
g++ -c -O2  -pthread -Wall -Wextra -Wno-ignored-qualifiers -Wformat -Wformat-security -Wno-unused-parameter -g -DBOOST_SPIRIT_THREADSAFE -I/root/draftcoin/src -I/root/draftcoin/src/obj -I/usr/include/libdb4 -DUSE_UPNP=0 -DENABLE_WALLET -I/root/draftcoin/src/leveldb/include -I/root/draftcoin/src/leveldb/helpers -DHAVE_BUILD_INFO -fno-stack-protector -fstack-protector-all -Wstack-protector -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2  -MMD -MF obj/protocol.d -o obj/protocol.o protocol.cpp
g++ -c -O2  -pthread -Wall -Wextra -Wno-ignored-qualifiers -Wformat -Wformat-security -Wno-unused-parameter -g -DBOOST_SPIRIT_THREADSAFE -I/root/draftcoin/src -I/root/draftcoin/src/obj -I/usr/include/libdb4 -DUSE_UPNP=0 -DENABLE_WALLET -I/root/draftcoin/src/leveldb/include -I/root/draftcoin/src/leveldb/helpers -DHAVE_BUILD_INFO -fno-stack-protector -fstack-protector-all -Wstack-protector -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2  -MMD -MF obj/rpcclient.d -o obj/rpcclient.o rpcclient.cpp
g++ -c -O2  -pthread -Wall -Wextra -Wno-ignored-qualifiers -Wformat -Wformat-security -Wno-unused-parameter -g -DBOOST_SPIRIT_THREADSAFE -I/root/draftcoin/src -I/root/draftcoin/src/obj -I/usr/include/libdb4 -DUSE_UPNP=0 -DENABLE_WALLET -I/root/draftcoin/src/leveldb/include -I/root/draftcoin/src/leveldb/helpers -DHAVE_BUILD_INFO -fno-stack-protector -fstack-protector-all -Wstack-protector -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2  -MMD -MF obj/rpcprotocol.d -o obj/rpcprotocol.o rpcprotocol.cpp
g++ -c -O2  -pthread -Wall -Wextra -Wno-ignored-qualifiers -Wformat -Wformat-security -Wno-unused-parameter -g -DBOOST_SPIRIT_THREADSAFE -I/root/draftcoin/src -I/root/draftcoin/src/obj -I/usr/include/libdb4 -DUSE_UPNP=0 -DENABLE_WALLET -I/root/draftcoin/src/leveldb/include -I/root/draftcoin/src/leveldb/helpers -DHAVE_BUILD_INFO -fno-stack-protector -fstack-protector-all -Wstack-protector -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2  -MMD -MF obj/rpcserver.d -o obj/rpcserver.o rpcserver.cpp
g++ -c -O2  -pthread -Wall -Wextra -Wno-ignored-qualifiers -Wformat -Wformat-security -Wno-unused-parameter -g -DBOOST_SPIRIT_THREADSAFE -I/root/draftcoin/src -I/root/draftcoin/src/obj -I/usr/include/libdb4 -DUSE_UPNP=0 -DENABLE_WALLET -I/root/draftcoin/src/leveldb/include -I/root/draftcoin/src/leveldb/helpers -DHAVE_BUILD_INFO -fno-stack-protector -fstack-protector-all -Wstack-protector -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2  -MMD -MF obj/rpcmisc.d -o obj/rpcmisc.o rpcmisc.cpp
net.cpp: In function 'void ThreadMapPort()':
net.cpp:981:74: error: invalid conversion from 'int*' to 'unsigned char' [-fpermissive]
     devlist = upnpDiscover(2000, multicastif, minissdpdpath, 0, 0, &error);
                                                                          ^
net.cpp:981:74: error: too few arguments to function 'UPNPDev* upnpDiscover(int, const char*, const char*, int, int, unsigned char, int*)'
In file included from net.cpp:19:0:
/usr/include/miniupnpc/miniupnpc.h:62:1: note: declared here

 ^
g++ -c -O2  -pthread -Wall -Wextra -Wno-ignored-qualifiers -Wformat -Wformat-security -Wno-unused-parameter -g -DBOOST_SPIRIT_THREADSAFE -I/root/draftcoin/src -I/root/draftcoin/src/obj -I/usr/include/libdb4 -DUSE_UPNP=0 -DENABLE_WALLET -I/root/draftcoin/src/leveldb/include -I/root/draftcoin/src/leveldb/helpers -DHAVE_BUILD_INFO -fno-stack-protector -fstack-protector-all -Wstack-protector -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2  -MMD -MF obj/rpcnet.d -o obj/rpcnet.o rpcnet.cpp
make: *** [obj/net.o] Error 1
make: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs...
```

I've found other cryptocurriences with simmilar problems:
https://github.com/dogecoin/dogecoin/issues/1292
